AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Returning regent
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: For centuries, [PAWN_nameDef] was a powerful regent from {PAWN_gender ? his : her} house. But a calamity forced {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to leave behind {PAWN_gender ? his : her} priviledges and possessions.\n\nNowadays, even after returning from the calamity that took him everything, {PAWN_nameDef} still treats people, even other elves, with a condescending, arrogant attitude.
